attributes.action: Deny a state visit for Donald Trump because he will embarrass  people of Britain
attributes.additional_details: The evidence is clear: President Donald Trump is a threat to public order in this country and his visit will embarrass the British public
attributes.background: Donald Trump has become US President peddling lies about minority ethnic groups in his own country and overseas. Trump verbally insults women and the disabled and is a threat to public order in the United Kingdom. He should not be allowed to visit the country.
